pages.title: Rarities
pages.text: Chests, locks, keys and loot tables all have an associated rarity. These rarities determine the likehood of the item being generated or selected. The rarites are $(6)COMMON$(0), $(6)UNCOMMON$(0),$(6)SCARCE$(0),$(6)RARE$(0), and $(6)EPIC$(0). You can see an item's rarity (and other useful info) by hovering over the item in your inventory.
